Good Game + Game Browser gamemodes like 'KZ'  -  10/10


If attempting to find/play kz
1) Launch CSGO
2) Click Play CS:GO
3) Click Community Server Browser (go to internet tab)
4) Search 'kz' and hit refresh and find one with low ping and with people in it
5) Chill and vibe

If you have questions about how to actually play kz, just ask some people in one of the servers for advice.
https://www.youtube.com/c/Kzclimbcsgo
